channel.title: Custom image for my client
channel.description:
I have been making a client using deob 317 but the crappy runescape logo still remains.
I have seen this before and I know it can be done!
Can someone please tell me how to use a custom image on my client. ;)

item.title: Custom image for my client
item.dc:creator: @pimjong pimjong
item.description:
@pimjong wrote:

Rofl, sorry didnt seen it :P.
I am mostly on RSR, so i dont have much time to read all posts here GOOD because i read EVERY post AND GOOD on RSR

Read full topic

item.title: Custom image for my client
item.dc:creator: @pimjong pimjong
item.description:
@pimjong wrote:

[quote=“wixter, post:2, topic:5583”]open up Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java and search for ‘Image image’ then change that line to

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(System.getPro perty("user.dir") + "\\DATA\\bg.jpg");

Then, in your client’s folder add something called DATA, make a bmp with exactly the pixel size of 383 x 503, or you can get 1 pic with double the length (766x503) and flip exactly half of the picture 180 degrees and replace it into the bg! (or just edit the one from the hotfixed client)[/quote]
class22_sub1_sub9_sub1 -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Custom image for my client
item.dc:creator: @wixter wixter
item.description:
@wixter wrote:

open up Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java and search for ‘Image image’ then change that line to

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(System.getPro perty("user.dir") + "\\DATA\\bg.jpg");

Then, in your client’s folder add something called DATA, make a bmp with exactly the pixel size of 383 x 503, or you can get 1 pic with double the length (766x503) and flip exactly half of the picture 180 degrees and replace it into the bg! (or just edit the one from the hotfixed client)

Read full topic
